Hwarang

Introduction

Song Jaewon, also known by the stage name Hwarang, is a South Korean rapper and dancer. He is a former member of the boy group TEMPEST.

Hwarang (then known as Song Jae Won) was introduced as a contestant of the survival show Under Nineteen on October 25, 2018, as part of the performance team. He was eliminated in episode 12 after placing 11th in the performance team and 32nd overall.

On March 2, 2022, under the stage name Hwarang, he debuted as the main rapper and main dancer of the boy group TEMPEST.

On October 19, 2023, Yue Hua Entertainment announced that Hwarang would undergo surgery for his injured shoulder and would be going on hiatus to recover.

On March 6, 2024, Yue Hua Entertainment announced that Hwarang would halt activities with the group for a second time due to a lack of trust between both parties. Subsequently, on August 11, 2024, Yue Hua Entertainment announced that both Hwarang and the company had mutually agreed to end his exclusive contract with Yue Hua, resulting in him leaving both the company, as well as TEMPEST.
